recipe.title: Gratin
recipe.ingredient: 1 cup rice that has been rinsed and soaked for 20 minutes
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C. Heat oil in large pan and cook garlic for 4 minutes. Add meat to pan and cook until no longer pink. Add capsicum and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add rice and cook for a few minutes. Add carrot, zucchini, passata, paprika, water and basil. Give it a good stir and place in a baking dish. Sprinkle cheese so it covers the entire top. Place in oven for 30 minutes. Serve with crusty bread and/or salad, if desired.
